summary: The client initiated the definition of a new sprint, and Mike from the Sprint Planning Architect confirmed and created SP-001: Authentication and Backend Foundation as the starting sprint for the MVP, which has been saved and queued.

decisions.title: Lock in SP-001 as starting sprint
decisions.details: Establishes secure base for MVP with discussed details

sign_offs.what: Approved and saved Sprint plan SP-001

actions.task: Confirm readiness to start execution of SP-001
